datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to strategy games, cards, and dice games.

columns.name: efficiency_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of total wins to hours played

columns.name: solitary_play_preference
columns.description: Player's preference for playing games alone

columns.name: quick_decision_games_frequency
columns.description: A count of how often a player engages in games that require quick decision-making annually

columns.name: strategic_complexity_preference
columns.description: Indicates the player's preference for strategic complexity in a game on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: game_complexity_score
columns.description: Average complexity score of the games played, rated from 1 to 10

columns.name: increase_in_win_probability
columns.description: Increase in win probability in unrelated card games by dice game players

columns.name: average_game_duration
columns.description: The average duration of a game session in minutes preferred by the player

columns.name: card_to_dice_win_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of the number of card game victories to the number of dice game victories over a year

columns.name: online_strategy_tournament_participation
columns.description: Tracks whether the player participates in online strategy game tournaments

columns.name: risk_preference
columns.description: Player's preference for risky decisions

columns.name: strategy_success_rate
columns.description: Percentage that measures strategy success in non-primary games

columns.name: forum_interaction_frequency
columns.description: The number of times a player posts or interacts in online game forums per month

columns.name: games_borrowed_frequency
columns.description: How frequently the player borrows games from friends, measured in times per month

columns.name: game_diversity
columns.description: Number of different types of games played in a session

columns.name: card_game_preference
columns.description: Player's preference for card games on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: cooperative_game_frequency
columns.description: Rate at which a player engages in cooperative board games annually

columns.name: board_game_genre_preference
columns.description: Indicates the player's preferred board game genre

columns.name: session_length
columns.description: Duration of the playing session in hours

columns.name: average_game_duration_hours
columns.description: Average duration of a game session in hours

columns.name: average_game_duration_minutes
columns.description: Average duration in minutes of games played by the player annually

columns.name: win_rate
columns.description: Percentage of games won by the player

columns.name: game_types_owned
columns.description: Count of different types of games owned by the player

columns.name: card_game_engagement_level
columns.description: Measures the engagement level of a player in card games on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: frequent_high_stakes_player
columns.description: Binary indicator whether the player frequently participates in high-stakes games

columns.name: plays_in_tournaments
columns.description: Indicates whether the player regularly participates in tournaments

columns.name: tournament_participation_frequency
columns.description: A count of how often a player participates in tournaments annually

columns.name: strategy_preference
columns.description: Indicates if a player prefers strategy components in games, where 1 means yes and 0 means no

columns.name: player_age_group
columns.description: Categorizes player age into groups

columns.name: engagement_score
columns.description: Score measuring engagement in learning new games, based on duration of sessions and feedback scores

columns.name: online_community_active
columns.description: Binary indicator if the player is active in online gaming communities

columns.name: likes_short_games
columns.description: Binary indicator if the player prefers games with a shorter playtime (less than 60 minutes)

columns.name: strategic_complexity_rating
columns.description: Player's average rating of strategic complexity for the games they play, on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: number_of_game_genres_played
columns.description: Number of different game genres the player has played over the past year

columns.name: social_media_presence
columns.description: Binary indicator if a player is active on social media related to board games

columns.name: age
columns.description: Age of the player

columns.name: game_experience_level
columns.description: Categorical rating of the player's overall experience from novice to expert

columns.name: tournament_win_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of tournaments won to total tournaments participated in

queries.question: Is there a relationship between card game engagement level, strategic preference, strategic complexity preference, participation in online strategy game tournaments, and an increase in win probability in unrelated card games as indicated by a specific multiplier factor?
